divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home on Sawkill Rd, when above I noticed a small pulsing light. As I kept driving I noticed the object coming closer overhead. When it finally flew over my car it was much closer, and pulsated slowly from bright green to darkness. There was no sound. There were no other marker lights on the object.
Summary: Round object, Pulsing Green, came closer from horizon and flew over me.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Kingston
There were no other sightings in Kingston on or around October 11th 2012
